mapper.insert: insert into import_point (day, userId, availablePoints, frozenPoints, create_time) values (#{day,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{availablepoints,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{frozenpoints,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into import_point
day,
userId,
availablePoints,
frozenPoints,
create_time,

INSERT INTO ${table} (day, userId, availablePoints,frozenPoints, create_time) VALUES
(${day}, #{item.user,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.availablePoints,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.frozenPoints,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: select DISTINCT userId from ${table} where day = #{day,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by userId desc
select DISTINCT userId from ${table} where left(day,6) = #{day,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by userId desc
